events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but it doesn't fit me at all. I would like to request a refund for this item as soon as possible.
The customer's message indicates a refund request due to wrong fit, categorizing this case under the Refund cluster.
Assigning this refund request to the Returns Specialist team for further handling and processing.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your recent purchase. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item has been returned or is ready to be shipped back to us?
Sure, my order number is 8453921. I haven’t sent the jacket back yet, but it is still in its original packaging and ready to be returned.
Thank you for the information. We will provide you a prepaid shipping label to return the jacket. Once we receive it, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
That sounds great, thanks for the prompt response and for making the return process easy for me.
The prepaid return label has been sent to your email. Please ship the jacket back as soon as possible to receive your refund promptly.
Just following up to confirm we have received your returned jacket and your refund has been processed successfully.
Your refund case is now closed. If you need any further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us again.
